doc:
Mike Gandolfi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mike_Gandolfi 0 Michael Gandolfi (born January 31, 1962) is an American actor, producer, and writer. He is best known for playing Andrew on the WB drama series, Gilmore Girls, and as a writer on the sitcom Roseanne. Michael_Gandolfi ( born January_31_,_1962 ) is an_American_actor , producer , and writer . He is_best_known for playing Andrew on the_WB_drama_series , Gilmore_Girls , and as a_writer on the_sitcom Roseanne .
